mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.uid,pi_shoper,supplier,user_name,pi_name,access_token,last_login,gender,shop_balance,level,u.personal_profile,img.origin_path as userImage, u.language,u.email,u.age, u.country FROM user_info u JOIN image img ON u.user_image = img.image_id where uid=#{uid};
select user_name,user_image from user_info where uid=#{uid}
SELECT shop_balance from user_info where uid=#{uid} and status = 0;
select i.item_id from item_info i join user_info u where u.uid = i.uid and u.uid = #{userId}
